function.name: get_records_req_impl_by_year
function.description: Get the Business Request (BR) records that are due to be implemented by given year

year.description: The year the Business Request (BR) was implemented in, e.g. 2024.

function.name: get_br_count_with_target_impl_date
function.description: Get the amount of business records (BR) that have a valid (or not) target implementation date (TID). Returns an amount of BRs that matches the criteria

valid.description: If we are checking for BRs with valid target implementation dates (TID) or not.

function.name: get_forecasted_br_for_month
function.description: Get the Business Request (BR) records that are forecasted for a given month (and optionally a year, else uses the current year)

month.description: The month the Business Request (BR) is forecasted to be implemented in, e.g. April, March, Jun, Dec, FEB, etc.

year.description: The year the Business Request (BR) is forecasted to be implemented in, e.g. 2024.

function.name: get_br_information
function.description: Gets information on a specific business request (BR) via it's BR number. It's a 5 or 6 digit number that can frequently be prepended by the letters BR, e.g. BR654321

br_number.description: The busines request (BR) number, it can consist of 5 or 6 digits, can sometimes be pre-pended by BR12345 for instance.

function.name: get_employee_information
function.description: Gets information on a specific employee by their name, it typically consists of a first name (given name) and last name (surname) of an employee, e.g. John Smith

employee_firstname.description: The first name (given name) of an employee, e.g. John, Daniel, or Mary

employee_lastname.description: The last name (surname) of an employee, e.g. Smith, Johnson, or Jones

function.name: get_employee_by_phone_number
function.description: Gets information on a specific employee by their phone number, it typically consists of a 10 digit phone number, e.g. 123-456-7890 or 1234567890

employee_phone_number.description: The phone number of an employee, e.g. 123-456-7890 or 1234567890
